farm.name: Basic sensor
farm.description: Use the basic sensor to supervise the basic filed conditions or conditions in halls.

farm.name: Weather station
farm.description: Plan your agro acvities according to all meteorological conditions on one rod.

farm.name: Storage hall sensor
farm.description: Make sure your harvest is well stored inside your storage halls to avoid any pests and diseases threats.

farm.name: Soil sensor
farm.description: Check soil humidity and temperature to manage your irrigation effectively and save on cost.
